I ordered a replacement charging cable for my Ticktalk 4 watch from the website as the original one was damaged. Unfortunately, the wrong cable arrived. I immediately reported the issue to customer support via email. Within just a few minutes of my report, they processed a refund! To my surprise, two days later, they sent the correct cable without any hassle on my part. I am grateful for such quick and impeccable customer support.
Excellent customer service - responsive and kept their word exactly as they said they would.

Review.Titre: Feel safe about giving your child independence!
Review.Contenu: Were were so excited to get these watches for our twin boys when they were 8 years old.  We have had them now for over a year and they are invaluable! We love the freedom and independence that it gives them and are extremely grateful for the product's impressive durability and functionality. Customers service has been incredible as well! Whenever we have had a problem, we have experienced quick responses and total satisfaction with their help.

Review.Titre: "TickTalk Watch - Freedom for kids and parents
Review.Contenu: We are thrilled with our TickTalk watches! Acquired for our kids at ages 5 and 7, these watches have shown impressive durability and functionality. They provide our kids the freedom to play with friends in the neighborhood, offering peace of mind for parents through the app to monitor and track their location.Tiffany Adams from customer service has been incredibly helpful and efficient, demonstrating great responsiveness. We're thoroughly satisfied with both the watches and the exceptional customer service.

We love our TickTalk watches!  We bought both of our kids TickTalk watches when they were 6 and 7 years old.  These watches are durable, my kids have worn them almost every day for nearly 2 years and they are still working well.  We wanted to give our kids a little more freedom to play with their friends in the neighborhood and these watches allow us to do so, while knowing their location and allowing us to get in touch with them when we want to check on them or call them home.  The customer service TickTalk provides is top notch.  When one of our sons lost a part of the end of his band, they promptly mailed us a replacement part at no cost.  We are very happy with these watches and the customer service.

I bought my daughter a tick talk watch for Christmas last year and have had to contact customer service a few times due to some updates and user questions. Customer service always responds quickly and are super helpful and always kind. It gives me peace of mind knowing I bought a watch that I can communicate with my daughter at any time and knowing customer service is always there to help. Definitely recommend!

Very happy with customer service. Had an issue with the watch and Tiffiny Adams helped solve my problem right away and made it easy for me to get a replacement. I always get a quick response when I contact them with questions or a problem. Love the tick talk because my son can play outside with his friends and I can always tell where he is and contact him if I need to. Thank you!

Review.Titre: I got all the details I needed when it…
Review.Contenu: I got all the details I needed when it came to my options between buying a new one or having the old one repaired. I was also provided with all the steps to ensure it worked out of the box. Thank you

Been using this watch for 3 years, no issues. While the parent app does sometimes log out, my son's watch works great. Love the parental controls and safety features. Love being able to keep track of him even if it's not the most accurate. He can make calls to us and he loves to send us pictures throughout his school day. He is in second grade.

My daughter has been using the pink TickTalk 4 for nearly a year now. She loves it! It took a little while to explain to family and friends how to download the app and figure out how they can communicate with her, but I like that it makes it difficult for strangers to break through that system and so she is protected. Recently our dog chewed the strap and she burst into tears when she saw it. Tick Talk customer service responded very quickly when I contacted them about the problem and made the repair process simple and speedy. Overall, a much better experience than when my son had a Gizmo watch. I would definitely recommend!

Review.Titre: Customer service was great and super…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was great and super helpful! Solved my issue in a flash!

I did a hefty amount of research for this purchase and luckily I was able to find TickTalk.  There were just a handful of other potential companies that seemed to be as on point and highly rated.  The option to not go through a 3rd party minute/plan provider was a key factor, along with all of the bells and whistles.  My kids love them (when they're not at school - and it's just a watch) and it provides me a ton of peace of mind as I work toward continuing their teaching(s) of independence.

Review.Titre: We have had a TickTalk watch for our…
Review.Contenu: We have had a TickTalk watch for our daughter for over a year now, and it has been a huge benefit to our lives. The comfort of being able to reach out to her when she is playing with neighbors is a great quality of life upgrade. Being able to find her if she is separated is wonderful. I can't imagine going on a trip without it. The parent control features are very useful. I love being able to set the watch to do not disturb during school hours. And we really love that she is not being exposed to social media.The customer service has also been great. We have had some recent damage issues with the watch, but they are quick to respond and help us and are sending a replacement.We've already recommended this watch to most of our friends, and gladly recommend it to the public in this review.

Tick Talk Support Specialist, Natsha, took great care of us.  She was extremely knowledgable, offered great suggestions how to quickly resolve our issue and followed through on all her commitments.  She represents the best of Tick Talk

The products are great but the customer service is what made this experience incredible. My son's strap broke and Tick Talk was going to replace the watch. The package got lost in the mail and our Tiffiny went above and beyond over the course of 1.5 months, working with me to provide a new watch despite the lost package. The service was unexpected at that level but extremely appreciated and I have nothing but wonderful things to say about my interactions with Tiffiny!

Review.Titre: We have had TickTalk 4 for about a…
Review.Contenu: We have had TickTalk 4 for about a year, very good option for my 11yr old boy. No games on it, but very fun for him to take photos, check reminders, call me anytime he needs to, and mostly I can check where he is whenever I want to. It made me feel settled. The customer service is also 5stars, whenever I have a question to call them, they always provide with detail instructions and help to solve the problem. Highly recommended!!!

Review.Titre: Great technical support and customer service!
Review.Contenu: I bought my 8 year old a ticktalk because I wanted something that he could understand was not a toy or for games but just for calling and texting. Very durable and service was pretty reliable. I did have an issue with the watch not charging but ticktalk support helped get me a replacement and I also had to get a replacement SIM card that I could not get to work but ticktalk support helped me get it working as well. My son loves it and I have complete control over who calls or texts him and can find him on GPS when needed so all in all very happy with purchase.

Just received our TickTalk 4 for my 8 year old son - it is a great introduction to tech. He had been asking nonstop for a phone/tablet and this watch was a perfect compromise. His ability to now call/text me has given him a lot of comfort, and he loves being able to stay connected with his extended family and buddies. I LOVE the GPS feature! I can track him when he's out playing with friends or riding his bike which provides us a greater level of safety. The watch is very intuitive and easy for him to operate, he loves it so far! I am also hoping (especially with the fact that he had to earn the watch) it will provide a good opportunity for him to learn about personal responsibility and taking care of possessions.

So far (less than a week) we have two watches for our kids. This is our second purchase of this type of smart watch. The TickTalk has more than enough features: secure calling texting, GPS, kid friendly, music, pedometer, camera, ect. For us, the security, GPS, and the reception are most important. Potential Cons: price point is higher, monthy service only (no discounted year subscription offered), also you must buy warranty to get wear and tear replacement/ fixed such as watch band, screen, water damage. It would be nice if this was included in original packaging at least in the first year as this is a product for kids.

Review.Titre: I have been very pleased with the…
Review.Contenu: I have been very pleased with the TickTalk watches I have purchased. It provides fun abilities for my kids to communicate with each other as well as with me and their grandparents. It has fun features where they can listen to songs and sometimes stories as well. I feel like TickTalk has captured everything I wanted to help me have access to my kids when I’m worried about them and provide them with the feeling of security knowing they can reach me whenever they need me. I also love the photo features. The one thing I wish they’d offer is an option for a softer/smaller wristband for my tiny kindergartener. Her watch slides slightly on the smallest setting and it bothers her. But she is very small for her age too.

We bought my son a Tick Talk 4 over a year ago. Customer service helped up set it up when we first got it. It worked great for over a year, until my son forgot to take it off while swimming, it won't turn back on now. I contacted customer service and they got back to me within an hour and offered to replace the watch. It was an easy process. I truly appreciate the speed and friendliness of Tiffany from their costumer service. I highly recommend Tick Talk for both their products and customer service.

We had two incidences with this watch. Once we took it to Mexico and the battery died completely we put it on the charger, but it still wouldn’t charge. We didn’t have the charging station for the watch, but after sending it in to customer service, they gifted us a charging station along with sending us his fixed and working watch back. Now the straps on the watch have broken off and Customer Service is willing to waive $100 fee in exchange for a review. I think that’s great customer service experience. I would recommend this watch to everyone, no matter the little kinks we encounter they all get resolved in a fairly fast and pleasant manner.

Review.Titre: My son has been SO happy with his watch!
Review.Contenu: My son has been SO happy with his Tick Talk watch, he loves the look of it, that he can stay in contact with his friends and family, and he especially loves being able to take photos when he's out and about. But the camera lens recently cracked, and now the camera is unusable. I realized the watch might still be under warranty so I reached out to customer service and spoke with Tiffany Adams, who was very helpful in figuring out my next steps to get the watch replaced.

We love our ticktalk 4.0 because it’s easy to use for our 8 year old and provides peace of mind while giving her more freedom to play in the neighborhood. It’s extremely user friendly and the customer support answers questions promptly. My most recent interaction with Tiffiny Adams was 10/10. She was helpful, polite, and funny!

Great kids smartwatch with great features.  Got this for my 8 year old son and it has everything he needs with nothing extra.  Ability to set his own timers is a great feature.  He also loves being able to group text with us and his grandparents.  We love the GPS tracking and Do Not Disturb feature for school.  Only complaint is that the water resistance could stand to be stronger.  My son left this on the edge of a hot tub for an extended period of time and we think the steam penetrated and caused some issues.  However, our warranty experience with Tiffany from TickTalk was fantastic and she helped us get a speedy replacement.

Review.Titre: Worth every single penny mom and dad!
Review.Contenu: I got to ask all my questions before actually making a purchase. You work seamlessly with my mobile carrier even in a rural community. It’s everything parents want and kids need. It’s been a great way to build trust and responsibility and independence within age appropriate boundaries!

My seven year old son has been using a TickTalk4 for the last year.  He loves it!  Battery life and ease of use are great.  The watch provides us comfort when wanders the neighborhood with his friends.  We researched the other options (Apple Watch, Gizmo) and felt this was the best option out there.  We were right!  As a bonus, customer service is responsive and helpful.

The support is excellent. I was in warranty and the charger went of  and these guys send me three cables and a docking base for free to match up the shipping cost I had to pay because and I was international customer. Thumbs up!

Review.Titre: My daughter loves her watch and it’s…
Review.Contenu: My daughter loves her watch and it’s school appropriate. She can call me and her dad whenever she wants and we can see where she is at all times. I love the safety features of this watch, especially on T-Mobile network. This is better than her last one from another brand.

We ordered two watches-one for our eight year old and the other for our ten year old. We are very pleased with the functionality and safety of the product. Its exactly what we wanted! We have the peace of mind knowing our boys can call us (or select family members) and we can easily see their GPS location via the app.  The app is very easy to use and it was quick and easy to set up the watches and add family members.  The boys were so excited to receive their watches for their birthdays and quickly figured out how to use them.  I spoke with Tiffiny in customer service and she quickly answered my questions and had excellent customer service. We will definitely purchase another watch for our youngest!

Review.Titre: We purchased the TickTalk 4 for our…
Review.Contenu: We purchased the TickTalk 4 for our son’s 10th birthday. We wanted him to have communication capabilities without the cost of a cell phone and he loves it! He can play music, takes pictures/video, text and the GPS function is amazing :) The set-up was quite easy, just required one quick call to customer service and they were amazingly kind and helpful. Otherwise I was able to set up the watch and have it functional in under an hour right from home. Fast forward 9 months and the watch was accidentally damaged while playing. The process to have it replaced has been quick and easy and the warranty options are fantastic. I would recommend this to anyone considering a bridge to a cell phone for their child.

We recently ran into an issue with our daughter's watch (Ticktalk4) and I decided to reach out to understand our options to resolve the issue.  The response and communication from Tiffiny Adams over at TickTalk was amazing.  Very helpful and prompt with her replies.  I honestly was not expecting this quick of a turnaround for my issue.  I am happy to know that something we use to keep track of my kids has this level of support.

We have two of these watches, one for each kid. It allows us to let our kids be a little more independent and safe without having smartphones. We love how sturdy they are, and they work flawlessly with the app. The battery life is excellent. One of the watches did eventually break, due to kids being kids, but the customer service has been great. We sent it in, and they responded quickly, and are willing to replace it. Great watch. Great company!

We’ve had Tick Talk watches for a few years now. I’m glad to have the security of the watch to communicate with my child without the concern of opening the Pandora’s Box of the internet. Tick Talk watch makes it easier to postpone getting my child a phone. You can limit who your child can contact & there is also gps, which is reliable most of the time. There is Iheart radio on the watch - the one thing I don’t understand is why it has a Disney Pride radio station for kids & not just a plain old Disney music station (as there is on Sirius XM). Customer service is very responsive -they stand behind their product.

Review.Titre: Great watch for a 7 year old!
Review.Contenu: We weren’t ready to give him a phone yet but wanted a safe way for him to connect with family. It’s nice to check on him while he’s outside-or when he’s moved further from the house then he’s supposed to. The GPS is fairly accurate… very close to actual location. The texting has been great and he loves face calling his sisters. The step tracking is a bonus—he’s been excited everyday to tell me he beat his previous day goal. If you want to connect with your child without all the distractions of games, social media, adds, etc. then this watch is perfect for you!
Had lots of great features- came within a week of being ordered and have received several emails with use instructions

Review.Titre: TickTalk4 is terrific watch for kids with excellent support
Review.Contenu: Absolutely terrific and beautiful watches for kids' tiny wrists.  We have two boys who loves their TickTalk4 watches. Lots of features, camera, games. Bottom line is: lots of fun for kids with many learning opportunities for kids, learning skills like being on time or letting mom knows whats going on at real time and very helpful during daily routines for busy families. Excellent choice for parents who wants to know where their kids are at any time (great continuous location tracking), Parents and kids can easy communicate with each other. Parents can also add any additional phone number to the list. There is emergency button for rapid communication as well. Teachers allowed my kids to carry their watches on their wrist at all times even though we have "no electronic devices policy". There is a feature that limits the use of watches during the school time without disconnecting emergency features. Overall beautiful and useful product helping family to stay in touch and feel more secure.

Tick Talk has provided excellent customer service to me. They've always been prompt and clear I their responses. I spoke with Tiffiny Adams who helped me with support for my son's Tick Talk 4 watch. She was so friendly and knew exactly how to resolve my issue. My son loves his watch and it has been great using it to keep insomuch with him right after school and as he becomes more independent. I highly recommend this company for parents with young kids!

Review.Titre: My son’s love their TickTalk watches…
Review.Contenu: My son’s love their TickTalk watches and they are so easy to use!  I have peace of mind sending them to play at a friend’s house or bike to school because of their watches.  I’ve had to talk to TickTalk customer service twice because my son’s damaged their watches (which is VERY hard to do I must add) and customer service is EXTREMELY knowledgeable, professional and friendly.  I’m so glad we gave them our business!

Review.Titre: Great watch for what we bought it for
Review.Contenu: Great watch for what we bought it for, to keep track of our son while he is out playing with his friends. The durability could be a little better though. He’s an outdoorsy kinda kid. Tiffany with the customer service department has been a great help. Definitely would recommend.

My kids (10 and 7) love their TickTalk watches! It’s been very useful and convenient for them and for my husband and I to communicate instantly when they are at school, play dates and extra curriculars. As they get older, they want more freedom (within reason) and having these watches helps with that. My son’s watch recently stopped working (later to find out due to water damage) and Tiffiny from customer support was quick to address my claim. She even sent me a shipping label so they could inspect the watch. That was Friday and by Tuesday, she responded with a solution. As a busy parent, I appreciated how Tiffiny kept the process moving so quickly and smoothly!

Review.Titre: Great Product and Great Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: Quick shipping, prompt customer service, and they even did a price match - really pleased with this company so far! My son also really enjoys his new watch - a great bridge between nothing and a smartphone. He loves to tell me how his day is going and I love how well he's been communicating his emotions more with the device!

Review.Titre: I had a great experience with TIckTalk…
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience with TIckTalk thus far. My son got his phone a few days ago, and everything is working as promised. I had several questions, that were answered very thoroughly through the phone customer service. I like that the watch gives my son some independence but allows me to get in touch with him when needed.

This watch has been a great help to the safety of my child. I absolutely love the customer service I have received and I would recommend this to every parent who is looking for a reliable means of communication for their child.

I have purchased this watch on 6th July 2023 and till than my child is using. I have choose the AT&T network for this and really what a coverage of network as i can call to my child any time and even he can call me any time. Audio, Video , voice , all types of call works great. I will recommend this watch for everyone. Earlier i have purchased other company watch which i have to return after 2 days due to network connectivity and lack of features but this watch is having all the features which is required for your child.

Review.Titre: Comfort watches for me and my child..
Review.Contenu: I have owned these watches for my children for the last 4-5 years and I have really liked the features they have to offer. I am happy to see them expand their accessory line and hope to see more band options again in the future for ticktalk 4. I do wish there was a way to connect them to a computer via Bluetooth to be able to download the pictures and videos, because my kids are hilarious with their little photo taking. But I do recommend this product

Review.Titre: We bought two watches for a big family…
Review.Contenu: We bought two watches for a big family trip to Disney.  We wanted to make sure we all felt safe as well as providing a little more independence to our kids.  We based our purchase off of reviews compared to other watches.  They recently died unexpectedly but customer service was outstanding and helped us navigate and troubleshoot.  We ended up having to send them in and we were given a prepaid label.  The process to find a fix has been easy and smooth.  I highly recommend this product to other families who are looking for a way to give their kids more independence without having a cell phone.

WE LOVE THIS WATCH!!!!! The watch has given us so much peace of mind as we navigate my son getting older and wanting freedom. He is able to reach me anywhere and I can track what he's doing. We have grown reliant on this technology and would recommend it to anyone!

The customer service has been superb! The troubleshooting and communications was not lacking at all. Our tech, Tiffiny Adams, work endlessly to resolve our issues. One being a cord replacement and other a found issue with missing a gold prong for the SIM card to work.  We are excited to get my child’s watch back working as it is a great tool to keep in touch and not be concerned about the internet! Thank you!

Review.Titre: We absolutely love our tick talk 4.0!!!
Review.Contenu: We absolutely love our tick talk 4.0. With everything going on today, it has given me peace of mind to be able to communicate with my child when we aren't together. I researched several other options before giving the tick talk a try and I definitely feel like we made the right choice. If you are looking to curb internet access but still allow some fun, this is the device! I can communicate clearly with my child via voice messaging, phone call, or text. I recently reached out to customer service because we had a small issue with the watch band. Tiffiny Adams responded swiftly and is extremely professional. She was really helpful with this issue and took care of it immediately! Highly recommend this company and the tick talk 4.0.

Review.Titre: Prefect little watch for the kid
Review.Contenu: Prefect little watch for the kid. The prenatal control is great. I am able to set school time where the watch won't work when she is in class. Keep up with her location at all times

Review.Titre: We’ve had the watch for around 6…
Review.Contenu: We’ve had the watch for around 6 months. We’ve had 2 issues we needed help with and the customer service and warranty department has been incredible. Very responsive and timely in their actions. The phone help people are incredibly helpful and patient as well. We have been very happy with the service and the product. I cannot recommend the device enough and have many friends who bought the watch because we suggested it for them. Overall great experience.

Review.Titre: TickTalk, great product and exceptional customer service...
Review.Contenu: The TickTalk watch is a great product to stay connected with kids. It has phone call, video call, messaging, and emergency call functionalities and best of all the app allows complete control of the watch to make sure your child only uses the features you want at the time you want. The watch recently stopped working and the customer service from TickTalk was exceptional. We got a very quick response to email and Tiffiny Adams was excellent providing a simple process to have the watch replaced. Overall extremely satisfied with TickTalk and highly recommended.

Review.Titre: U S based small company with great…
Review.Contenu: U S based small company with great customer service.

Review.Titre: TickTalk customer service is the reason…
Review.Contenu: TickTalk customer service is the reason that I would recommend this watch and I have recommended it to my friends with children. They are so helpful and eager to make the customer happy. The company has empowered thier team to stand behind their product and do what is necessary to make the customer happy. Their superb service has convinced me that when my youngest child is ready, I'll be coming back to this company to make another purchase.

First I have to say my daughter and I are very happy with her Tick Talk watch. She has had it since September and she takes it everywhere. A couple of her friends have gotten the watch because of her. Recently we I contacted customer service due to a minor repair the watch needed and they were very accommodating. Overall very happy with the device and the company service.

Review.Titre: We have loved having our ticktalk
Review.Contenu: We have loved having our ticktalk. It gives our son some much desired freedom while also giving me piece of mind. We had an incident with some damage and the customer service has been great. Tiffiny has been quick to reply to messages and very helpful. We have been satisfied with our purchase!

I reached out to customer care with a question about one of the two watches that we purchased this past year. Tiffiny Adams provided exceptional customer service. She was expeditious in responding to my questions and provided an immediate resolve! The watches have given us peace of mind and also granted our children some additional independence. Great watch and great company to deal with.

Fantastic customer service. Reached out with an issue on my son’s watch. Service rep Tiffiny Adams responded quickly and was able to help me solve the issue without hassle. It’s rare to have a company care about individual needs in this way. I’m truly appreciative of their service and assistance. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: We’ve had nothing but great experiences…
Review.Contenu: We’ve had nothing but great experiences with TickTalk, particularly with customer service! When we initially got the watch, the SIM card wasn’t connecting with the watch, and the customer service agent I worked with gave us some quick fixes that had it working in 5 min! And recently when my son dropped his watch and broke the face, I worked with Tiffiny at customer service who was able to help me get the watch covered to be repaired! We’ve had great experiences with the watch and would definitely purchase again!

So far so good. I got this watch for my son as his very first smartwatch. Set up was pretty straight forward; if you're planning to add the watch line to your T Mobile account make sure you add it as a voice line and not a watch line as it won't work. I like that it functions as a phone but without the distractions of games and social media. A great way to stay connected with your kids; would recommend.

The customer service is the best I have had. Tiffiny is very responsive and helpful. We got the feedback and detailed instructions for troubleshooting the next day after we contacted them. When that did not work, they sent the replacement right away. That is the top notch customer service.

Review.Titre: The watch and been really great…
Review.Contenu: The watch and been really great to have.  Being able to contact my child and track her has really helped my anxiety when allowing my child to take the school bus to school.  Horror stories of kids being left at the wrong stops forced me to find a solution to this potential problem. But it’s also been great to have to contact my child directly when they are with the other parent or other caregivers. The battery life is decent. We get about 2days of use before a charge is needed and it doesn’t come with a bunch of games to drain the batteries or if you are worried about screen time you don’t need to be with this.

Hello, I purchased this product and I am very satisfied about the product and the customer service I have received. Product is as described and I feel so much more in control knowing I can find my child at a moments notice.

My son has had the TickTalk watch for almost one year and it has been such a relief and security knowing I can see where he is and call/FaceTime anytime. He recently came back from visiting with friends and family and the watch face was not damaged yet unresponsive. I spoke with Tiffany and she provided clear steps on how to return the watch for diagnosis and the replacement process. I received the shipping label and within two days Tiffany contacted me with the results and replacement options. Excellent product and service that supports it.

Review.Titre: We are so thankful we found Tick Talk…
Review.Contenu: We are so thankful we found Tick Talk for our two boys. It is so nice to be able to get a hold of them whenever we need to but also monitor anyone that is their contact. I can check on their messages to make sure that everything is appropriate. Also, I’m able to do video chat with them. As far as Tick Talk is concerned, they have impeccable customer service, and are very quick to respond to any issues that may arise.

We have had 3 tick talk 3 and 3 tick talk 4 watches. The 4 was a great improvement! We use them constantly, the calls always go through, and the location is accurate. The customer service is fantastic. When you call, you actually talk with a real person. If you email, they respond quickly. I needed a new charger and they put one in the mail within 24hrs. For busy, active kids this is a worthwhile investment.

Review.Titre: Great watch and great customer service!
Review.Contenu: I bought my 9-year old a TickTalk watch for Christmas in Dec 2021. It's been perfect for both of us. For me, I can reliably track his whereabouts, and for him, he can call me as needed from anywhere. The watch has held up great for 1 1/2 years, except for the watch band, which just broke. I contacted customer service, and Tiffiny Adams got back to me promptly and even offered to waive the $100 replacement fee.  Great watch and great customer service!

Tick Talk watch is great for parents looking for something for their kid(s) with reliable security and parental controls to be able to communicate with their kid(s). It’s cost-effective and has great customer service and support if needed.

Review.Titre: Excellent Customer service and replacement policy
Review.Contenu: Strap broken within three months...and the replacement came with in a week!!! with no charge!!!!!. Excellent customer service!!!! Rigid watch ..good for kids..nice interface in phone to update the watch and easy to see where the kids are....

We bought two watches for the kids , 7 and 9yo. They really love them, and what’s better is that the watches are great. They seem very sturdy, are comfortable, and also work very well. We wanted a way to call and text them without access to other things like social media or browsing and these are just perfect.

Review.Titre: My 10 year old has had the watch for a…
Review.Contenu: My 10 year old has had the watch for a little less than a year now and so far still working great and she loves it. we can effectively communicate via text or calls. The app is an amazing safety tool, everything goes through the adult in charge first. the quality of calls is just like any cell phone and the GPS locator also accurate. Customer service has been prompt and helpful every time. Thank you i will continue to promote the company with friends and family because i truly do love and feel my child is safe using the device.

Review.Titre: This is a great way to give your kids a…
Review.Contenu: This is a great way to give your kids a bit of freedom but still know exactly what they are doing. It allows you to track them via GPS and also call and text them. You do need to adjust the parental controls though so your child cannot call or text strangers and receive calls from u known numbers. It is fairly easy to setup and the plans are reasonable. $9.99 for basic and $19.99 for unlimited.

I purchased this watch in August 2021 along with a blue one for both my kids. I am so impressed with how well these watches work. My kids wear them daily to school and when we are out in big crowds. I am able to track their location at school in real time. I don't have to worry about random people calling and texting them with the firewall feature. They don't have internet access, which gives me peace of mind. Also the monthly cellular service is very economical and reliable. I trust the brand since I purchased the ticktalk 3. Highly recommended. Recently one of the watches needed as small repair and I heard back from the customer service team in less than 24hrs. Very satisfied with the product and service.

Review.Titre: I've been using the tickTalk watch for…
Review.Contenu: I've been using the tickTalk watch for 3years now because I needed a way to keep in touch with my child at anytime while he plays in the neighborhood, this device has been a lifesaver.  It's a phone that's worn as a watch. Simple and reliable and not a distraction, he simply wears it and we keep in touch.  The battery lasts all day.  The company backs up their product with a responsive service desk who are helpful and address any questions.

Great product, great service. Thank you GPS could be a little more accurate. Your employees do well with customer service. Natasha helped me with a purchase and a few other items being from michigan. She’s top notch.
Situation was handled by company.

Review.Titre: I was recommended the watch by a…
Review.Contenu: I was recommended the watch by a coworker who ordered one for his son. After doing a good deal a research, I decided to give the TickTalk watch a try. It arrived quickly and was very easy to setup. After having my 8 year old use it for about a week, we both loved it so much I ordered two more for my 6 and 7 year old. I love all of the parental safety features and the ability it allows me to connect with my kids and the access it gives them to connect with me and the extended family. I love the emergency SOS button and the GPS tracker. It puts me more at ease when my kids are out and about away from home. I would definitely recommend.

Review.Titre: TickTalk customer service solved my problem
Review.Contenu: The TickTalk agent solved my SIM card problem when the RedPocket folks kept me on a chat for an hour, gave me wrong information, and did not solve my issue!

I recently purchased a TickTalk 4 watch and called customer service for setup help. After 3 rings an actual person answered the phone. She gave me great customer service and told me everything I needed to know.

This is great! We bought this watch for our 7 year old. We travel for work and stay in campgrounds most of the time, this allows him to go to the playground by himself for a short time and we are able to see exactly where he is at. (Not that this Momma bear still doesn't go down and check on him anyway) this give him a little bit of independence. He loves being able to call his Grandparents, his Aunt and his older brother when he wants.

Watch is amazing, and I have recommended it to several friends and family members. We had an issue with the band recently, and recieved a very quick response from customer service. They sent us a new watch immediately after they received the broken one, it is rare to see companies that stand behind their product like that!
